          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A fused plug</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein fixierter Stecker</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une prise fondue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um plugue fundido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una spina fusa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα λιωμένο βύσμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un enchufe fundido</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the inside components and wire connections of a fused plug. Inside the fuse is a metal wire.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fuse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fused plug</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">live pin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">live wire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metal fuse wire</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die inneren Bestandteile 
und die Leitung Anschlüsse eines fixierten Steckers. Innerhalb 
der Sicherung ist ein Metalldraht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les composants et les 
connexions intérieurs de fil d'une prise fondue. À 
l'intérieur du fusible est un fil en métal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os componentes e as 
conexões internos do fio de um plugue fundido. Dentro do 
fusível é um fio de metal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i componenti ed i 
collegamenti interni del legare di una spina fusa. All'interno 
del fusibile è un nastro metallico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τα εσωτερικές συστατικά 
και συνδέσεις καλωδίων ενός λιωμένου βύσματος. Μέσα στη 
θρυαλλίδα είναι ένα καλώδιο μετάλλων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los componentes y las 
conexiones interiores del alambre de un enchufe fundido. Dentro 
del fusible está un alambre de metal.</string>
          </description>
